mods.abstract: Black and white half-length studio portrait of the Country Gentlemen. Pictured in the back row are (L-R) Bill Yates, Dick Smith, and Jimmy Gaudreau. Charlie Waller is in the front row. The photo was released by Len Holsclas and the Lendel Agency. To view a poster that features the metal photoplate made from this photo, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/22027.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
